Html:
Hello Everyone,

I just started using this amazing library and i am trying to make a custom endpoints(vertex's)
and lines(edges) custom design of my own.

I want to make Vertexs that contains Image + 2 Labels/TextBoxes
and Edge to be a image / another color.

I saw Sacha blog - http://sachabarbs.wordpress.com/2010/08/31/pretty-cool-graphs-in-wpf/
but i didn't really understood something out of what he made.

If someone could explain me how to create Custom Vertex+Edge deeply that would be awesome! :)

Thanks Heads up!

Hi, you must implement your own templates for VertexControl and EdgeControl. Templates are here:
https://graphsharp.codeplex.com/SourceControl/latest#Source/Graph#.Controls/Themes/Generic.xaml

Btw, look at the GraphX project, i bet it will amaze you even more :)
